attributes.action: Reinstate the Reciprocal Health Agreement between the United Kingdom and the Channel Islands.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Channel Islanders who fall ill or have accidents in the United Kingdom will now have to pay for any treatment they receive. The same applies for citizens of the United Kingdom who fall ill in one of the islands. Despite us all being part of the British isles we are now unable to co-operate on a basic matter of crucial importance to many people. Should British citizens really need health insurance when they are in another part of the British isles?
